page.title: 12More Work at Langford School
page.content: The children use books for learning to read, for looking up information, and for enjoyment.Every classroom had lots of interesting books. Lots of times during the week they can paint, draw, cut, stick, shape, model and do other Art and Craft Work. Sometimes pictures and models are made about their Topic Work. Most of them enjoy their Drama, Music and P.E. work. Once a week the older children go by coach to the indoor swimming pool in Witney.They also do Country Dancing in the Summer. In 1984 the school had a computer for the first time. They bought an RML480Z which is a 64K computer.It is used in all the classes.They have lots of tapes and they like the Arrow and Write tapes best.(Arrow is a LOGO program and Write is a Word Processing program).
